Content.Text:
<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>! Will you just look at me
already?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, honey, look this way！

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Go to your mommy, <CHILD_NAME>.

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>. Please look over here.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hey, <MYNAME>. Look at me.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
See if you can get over to Mommy, <CHILD_NAME>.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Go to your daddy, <CHILD_NAME>!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, lookie here!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look, <CHILD_NAME>... there's your daddy!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, please look this way!

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Look, <MYNAME>, pumpkin! How cute!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Dear little <MYNAME>, would you please
look this way?

<FACE_BABY_1><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Aaah, uuuh... Papa!

<FACE_BABY_1><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Aaah, uuuh... Mama!

<FACE_ALLEN><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> has learned to crawl. Pretty
cute, huh?

<FACE_ROD><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> started crawling! Isn't that just
awesome?

<FACE_SENGOKU><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> learned how to crawl! They grow
up so fast, don't they?

<FACE_SERUKA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> has started crawling! This is a
very happy moment for me.

<FACE_NEEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> just started to crawl! It's
amazing how fast they grow.

<FACE_SYUMITTO><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
I was very surprised that <CHILD_NAME> has
already started crawling.

<FACE_TINA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> can crawl already! I was so
amazed when I saw it this morning!

<FACE_MICHEL><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
The sight of our <CHILD_NAME> crawling is so
very cute!

<FACE_YURI><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
<CHILD_NAME> can crawl already? I'm so happy!

<FACE_IROHA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Isn't <CHILD_NAME> crawling the sweetest
little thing?

<FACE_FELICIA><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
Seeing my sweetie pie <CHILD_NAME> growing
up so well moves me so much!

<FACE_WITCH><POS_LEFT><FACE_ROUGH>
My little <CHILD_NAME> can already crawl!
Quite cute, I must admit.

<FACE_BABY_1><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
A... uu... Da!

<CHILD_NAME>, you're so lovely when you crawl!
Please grow up strong and healthy.
